full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 2RS PINDIAS GT GIT TOUR GORD TWO RUPEES HRT TWO RUPEES :: 2 :: 3- That Mr. Mahesh Swaroop and his family are well known to me. I have been a family friend of Mr. Mahesh Swaroop s/o Late Mr. Narhar Swaroop and his wife late Mrs. Om Wati Devi daughter of Late Mr. Amba Prasad Verma, since my childhood. 4- That from my personal knowledge I know that Mr. Mahesh Swaroop and (Late) Mrs. Om Wati Devi were married to each other in accordance with the Hindu Vedic rites at Bareilly (U.P.) India, NOTARY on Fabruary 5, 1929. allow :: 3 : : difference Jomit Advocate & No tary BAREILLY
